website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 574 Core remains true to its iconic predecessor from 1988. It retains the original’s neat silhouette and its use of mesh and suede on the upper. Indeed, New Balance invested in the 574’s timelessness, and their decision to do so could never be more right.The 574 Core has enjoyed high levels of success since its release, with both men and women appreciate the style and comfort that it brings. At an affordable price a pair, the New Balance 574 Core is indeed worth the try.
pros: The New Balance 574 Core is a true classic and an icon at that
Many of those who have left reviews appreciate how comfortable this model feels on their feet
Wearers can have this shoe in tonal hues or in exciting color combinations
just perfect for those who want to play around with their styling
A significant percentage of those who own a New Balance 574 Core love the fact that they can wear this pair almost anywhere
Some of the ladies have commented that this iteration of New Balance 574 sneakers smoothly goes with their dresses
There were those who have said that the NB 574 Core gave them the arch support that they needed
Some reviewers noted that 574 Core shoes are perfect for those who usually walk around a lot like college students
The New Balance 574 Core is not that expensive investment in style and comfort
cons: The New Balance 574 Core is not really durable, according to a few
A handful of shoppers are disappointed that the colors were not exactly what they were in person
A small number of those who have ordered wide width felt that the shoe was not wide enough

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but defect already
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very good. I really like NB shoes and have had several pairs. Unfortunately these are already faulty. The stiching on the left shoe is broken as you can see of the attached Picture. I got the shoes 31. March and not worn them hard. I have been trying to find out where to report faulty items but that is almost impossible since it is a few months ago I got the product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Akstrup

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable tongue
customer_reviews.text: The tongue is unpadded unlike other 574 models, with very rough and uncomfortable stitching on the label there. It rubbed incessantly and I could not wear them. They are a lovely-looking pair of trainers-shame about the quality of design and manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit. Lovely looking trainer but get at least ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor fit. Lovely looking trainer but get at least a half size larger than you would normally, possibly even a size up. I'm usually 91/2-10 but this size 10 is very tight
customer_reviews.author: Chris Puddy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: If you know your shoe size then go for it. They're an exact fit. Half sizes are perfect for me as i'm a 9 in some shoes and a 10 in others. I'll always go for 9.5 if it's available. Perfect fit! They're confortable and feel supportive in all the right places. That's all I want in a trainer really. You pick it because you like what it looks like. Not much else to say about a shoe...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wide
customer_reviews.text: Good for wide feet. I normally need shoes that look unusually long on me (given my height) - these look far more proportioned for my hobbit feet.
customer_reviews.author: creechitup

customer_reviews.title: Completely wrong sizing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a UK size 9 and was at least 2 sizes too small. The shoe itself felt really comfortable but be wary of sizing. The box said it was a UK 9 / US 10 which I don't believe matches up so double check sizing before ordering
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: Good sizing
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the combination of colors, it’s a personal thing, great true to life fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers and the perfect fit. Bought a pair last year, size 8 but these proved to be a very tight uncomfortable fit so bought the 8.5 and these are just right. My advice would be to buy the next size up from your usual size
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Beckley

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Really great looking comfortable trainer. As others have said I would consider a half size above your usual size
customer_reviews.author: Mr T

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Reading other people's reviews about shoe sizing, I came to a conclusion that the most important parameter is inches/cm. Numbers don't matter. All in all, great shoes, comfortable and good looking. Fit is not so good because I have ordered 1 size bigger due to the reviews. Otherwise, fit is standard.
customer_reviews.author: cRaYgaN

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for a month, and bottom and inner sole is coming apart. Fake, do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: SalC

customer_reviews.title: Different colour than advertised...
customer_reviews.text: I've sent it back because of the colour... The blue colour from the picture is totally different than what I have received.
customer_reviews.author: 🤪 FALIMENT 🤪

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good happy with my choice very servialble . Don’t know what more people would want to know
customer_reviews.author: Sweetnuts

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure these are not genuine. After about 6 weeks of wear they completely went out of shape and look pretty awful. Plus the inner soles are loose and move around.
customer_reviews.author: DaveyP90

customer_reviews.title: Colour great
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than size, great quality, and much cheaper than shops.
customer_reviews.author: paula white

customer_reviews.title: Great looking trainers but the fit is a half size ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking trainers but the fit is a half size bigger than normal, I only take UK10 but have had to get a 9.5 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a 1/2 size bigger. But Lovely trainers
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers. Really comfortable and stylish. I’m normally a uk 10 and I got these in size 11 - they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Golly222

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, they fit perfectly and they are incredibly comfortable. Excellent trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere near as comfy as my 576’s but Better than I was expecting. They came up even smaller than my other pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: fantastic fit for me , cos ive got wide feet and the shoes look great. I'll definitely be sticking with new balance in future ..5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Peter  waldie

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery and Item exactly what I wanted, and as described
customer_reviews.author: Scott Austin

customer_reviews.title: Ordered trainers. Received trainers
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainer. Revived exactly what I ordered. Colour. Size. New Balance Men's 574v2 Trainers And on time so nothing at fault
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I had to go up a half size in these, a darker orange than expected
customer_reviews.author: Gary Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but big.
customer_reviews.text: Hello! Fast shipping. Cool sneakers, but not EGN, but ESN! Before them ordered the size of 10 UK, were a little small. These are the opposite large. Thank.
customer_reviews.author: e_mekhanik

customer_reviews.title: They are really comfy
customer_reviews.text: They are really comfy. Good quality, great for walking and daily use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initially great...But inner fabric wore down within a week
customer_reviews.text: Intially it was great, good fit. Within a week of walking the inner fabric lining began to wear down around the medial heal
customer_reviews.author: J H.

customer_reviews.title: 5 found them a bit too small so sent them back for a size 9 replacement and found that the size 9 was fine then found that they were £ 30
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 8.5 found them a bit too small so sent them back for a size 9 replacement and found that the size 9 was fine then found that they were £ 30.00 cheaper !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Lathey

customer_reviews.title: New Trainers
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these - they look smart and are very stylish - result
customer_reviews.author: lewazz

customer_reviews.title: Bad product - cloth not stiched properly which make blister on feet
customer_reviews.text: Got defect in this shoes. dad wear them which puts mark on feet when wear due to the defective cloth stiching which gets folded.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got halve size up after reading reviews great trainer's, comfortable as fcuk would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Size fits perfectly, nice colour. Great shoes for every day
customer_reviews.author: La siddi

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 574v2 Trainers
feature_bullets: Mens New Balance ML574 Trainers in Navy- Retro styled lightweight trainer.- Leather and mesh layered upper.- Lace up closure.- Padded collar and tongue.- Leather heel patch.- Iconic N logo.- Cushioned insole.- ENCAP Inch midsole technology for support and durability.- EVA cushioning midsole.- Rubber outsole.- Branding to side, tongue and heel
